summary: This document is a chain of emails from March-April 2020 between an Assistant U.S. Attorney from the SDNY Epstein team and attorney Gloria Allred, coordinating a call to discuss an update and Allred's clients. The emails show the prosecution team seeking to communicate with potential victims represented by Allred.

persons.name: Gloria Allred
persons.context: Prominent attorney communicating with the SDNY Epstein prosecution team about arranging a call to discuss her clients and receive an update.

events.title: Initial call between SDNY and Gloria Allred
events.description: The SDNY Epstein team and attorney Gloria Allred had a call where the prosecution mentioned specific individuals.

events.title: Scheduled conference call with a client
events.description: Gloria Allred arranges a conference call for the SDNY team to speak directly with one of her clients, following a previous discussion.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY
keyFacts: The Southern District of New York (SDNY) Epstein prosecution team was actively coordinating with victim attorney Gloria Allred in March-April 2020.
The prosecution sought to provide Allred with an update and discuss her clients, indicating her clients were potential victims or witnesses.
Allred facilitated direct communication between the SDNY team and at least one of her clients.
The correspondence shows the ongoing investigative and prosecutorial efforts related to the Epstein case well after his death.
